description: Shubenacadie River is a waterway portion of The Great Trail. The first section (7.4 km) is from the Brickyard Park in Lantz, NS to Wickwire Park, Milford Station, NS by the Milford Quarry. The second section (17.4 km) is from Wickwire Park, Milford Station, NS to the Shubenacadie Ball field park, Shubenacadie, NS. Each park has a dock place in the river from mid May to mid Oct (Nova Scotia Park season) and available parking. The paddle is down river but tidal bore can be felt for the last few kilometres.
directions: Hwy #2 to Lantz, NS, turn east on Hwy 277 for 0.5 km to left on Green Rd, to the Brickyard Park entrance.Hwy #2 to Milford Quarry, turn east on road to quarry across from Baptist Church, Wickwire Park entrance.Hwy #2 to Shubencadie Ball Field and Park
title: The Great Trail: Shubenacadie River
